availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Foster McWhorter (Wayne County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Wayne County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Jane McWhorter. Farmer in Russell County in 1860 and 1870.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Russell, Russell, p. 71. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Russell, Precinct 1, p. 56. Find A Grave, "Jack Foster McWhorter (February 17, 1826-January 21, 1896)," Memorial #120152175, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/120152175 (accessed February 5, 2018).
